definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: pl. Da 7:5; n.f. om. v:Da 7:8, v:Da 7:20;

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: pl. Da 7:24; after, Da 3:24; Da 6:3, Da 6:11, Da 6:14, so [[אָ֠]] Ezr 6:4; [[יוֹם תְּלָתָה]] Ezr 6:15 third day; sf. [[תְּלָתֵּהוֹן]] (K:§ 65, Anm,1) Da 3:23 the three of them.
